filmography.title: My Friend Irma
filmography.role_description: A bumbling, high-voiced juice bar attendant; Lewis's film debut which launched the Martin & Lewis phenomenon.
filmography.plot: A scatterbrained woman meddles in the lives of her roommate and their neighbors, including a duo of aspiring entertainers.

filmography.title: At War with the Army
filmography.role_description: A hapless private who constantly gets into trouble while trying to visit his wife and new baby.
filmography.plot: A comedy about the mishaps of two friends, a sergeant and a private, stationed at an army base during WWII.

filmography.title: Sailor Beware
filmography.role_description: A hypochondriac sailor who is tricked into boxing and romance by his scheming partner.
filmography.plot: A sailor bets that his bumbling friend can get a kiss from a famous French cabaret singer.

filmography.title: The Stooge
filmography.role_description: A clumsy song-plugger who becomes the uncredited comic foil for an arrogant singer, mirroring the duo's real-life dynamic.
filmography.plot: A struggling vaudeville performer hires a 'stooge' to sit in the audience and heckle him, but the stooge becomes the star.

filmography.title: Scared Stiff
filmography.role_description: A timid busboy who gets dragged to a haunted island in Cuba by a singer fleeing the mob.
filmography.plot: A singer and a busboy flee mobsters and end up on a spooky island inherited by an heiress.

filmography.title: The Caddy
filmography.role_description: A skilled golfer with a fear of crowds who coaches his smooth-talking friend to success.
filmography.plot: A gifted golfer who is afraid of crowds coaches his brother-in-law to success, leading to a comedy act.

filmography.title: Living It Up
filmography.role_description: A railroad station agent who mistakenly believes he is dying of radiation poisoning and accepts a free trip to New York.
filmography.plot: A small-town man diagnosed with radiation poisoning is given a last-fling trip to New York, but then discovers he isn't dying.

filmography.title: Artists and Models
filmography.role_description: A comic-book obsessed nerd whose nightmares provide the inspiration for his roommate's drawings.
filmography.plot: An artist uses his roommate's sleep-talking dreams to create a successful comic book series, attracting spies and models.

filmography.title: Hollywood or Bust
filmography.role_description: A movie-crazy fan who wins a car and drives cross-country to meet Anita Ekberg; the final Martin & Lewis film.
filmography.plot: A gambler and a movie fanatic share a car won in a raffle and drive cross-country to meet Anita Ekberg.

filmography.title: The Delicate Delinquent
filmography.role_description: A gentle janitor mistaken for a gang member who is mentored by a cop to become a police officer; Lewis's first solo film.
filmography.plot: A police officer tries to reform a goofy janitor who is constantly being mistaken for a juvenile delinquent.

filmography.title: The Sad Sack
filmography.role_description: An inept soldier with a photographic memory who gets involved in espionage in North Africa.
filmography.plot: The Army's worst soldier is assigned to a WAC major to be whipped into shape, but ends up in a spy plot.

filmography.title: Rock-A-Bye Baby
filmography.role_description: A small-town TV repairman who agrees to care for the triplets of his former sweetheart, a movie star.
filmography.plot: A confirmed bachelor is forced to take care of triplets to protect the reputation of a famous actress.

filmography.title: The Geisha Boy
filmography.role_description: A clumsy magician on a USO tour in Japan who bonds with a young orphan boy.
filmography.plot: A magician traveling with a USO tour in Japan tries to help a little boy who hasn't laughed since his parents died.

filmography.title: The Bellboy
filmography.role_description: A mute bellboy at the Fontainebleau Hotel in Miami who causes silent chaos; Lewis's directorial debut.
filmography.plot: A series of vignettes involving the misadventures of a mute bellboy at a luxury hotel in Miami Beach.

filmography.title: Cinderfella
filmography.role_description: A gender-reversed Cinderella figure who lives with his wicked stepmother and stepbrothers.
filmography.plot: A modern adaptation of the classic fairy tale with a man in the title role, helped by a Fairy Godfather.

filmography.title: The Ladies Man
filmography.role_description: A heartbroken man who swears off women and takes a job at a boarding house filled with Hollywood starlets.
filmography.plot: After his girlfriend dumps him, a man takes a job as a handyman at a women-only boarding house.

filmography.title: The Errand Boy
filmography.role_description: A paperhanger hired by a movie studio to spy on employees, who instead causes disasters on every set.
filmography.plot: A movie studio chief hires a bumbling paperhanger to be his spy on the lot, leading to chaos behind the scenes.

filmography.title: It's Only Money
filmography.role_description: A TV repairman who dreams of being a detective and unknowingly is the heir to a missing fortune.
filmography.plot: A TV repairman with aspirations of being a private eye helps a detective find a missing heir, unaware that he is the heir.

filmography.title: The Nutty Professor
filmography.role_description: A nerdy chemistry professor who invents a serum that transforms him into a smooth, arrogant lounge singer.
filmography.plot: A timid chemistry professor discovers a potion that transforms him into a smooth-talking, party-animal alter ego.

filmography.title: Who's Minding the Store?
filmography.role_description: A clumsy dog walker who falls for a department store heiress and is given impossible tasks by her mother; features the famous typewriter scene.
filmography.plot: A wealthy department store owner tries to break up her daughter's romance with a bumbling clerk by giving him impossible jobs.

filmography.title: The Patsy
filmography.role_description: A bellboy who is chosen by a management team to replace a recently deceased comedian.
filmography.plot: When a famous comedian dies, his management team tries to mold a clumsy bellboy into a star to keep the money flowing.

filmography.title: The Disorderly Orderly
filmography.role_description: An orderly at a private nursing home who suffers from 'neurotic identification pain', feeling the symptoms of every patient.
filmography.plot: A hospital orderly with a unique empathy problem causes chaos while trying to help patients.

filmography.title: The Family Jewels
filmography.role: Willard / James / Eddie / Everett / Julius / Skylock / Bugs
filmography.role_description: A tour-de-force performance playing seven different uncles of a young heiress who must choose her new guardian.
filmography.plot: A young heiress must choose one of her six uncles to be her guardian, all played by Lewis, along with her chauffeur.

filmography.title: Boeing, Boeing
filmography.role_description: An American journalist who gets entangled in his friend's scheme to juggle three flight attendant fiancées.
filmography.plot: A journalist living in Paris deceives three flight attendants into thinking they are each his one and only fiancée.

filmography.title: The King of Comedy
filmography.role_description: A cynical late-night talk show host who is kidnapped by an obsessed fan; widely considered his best dramatic performance.
filmography.plot: An aspiring comic kidnaps a talk show host in a desperate bid to get a spot on his show.

filmography.title: Funny Bones
filmography.role_description: A legendary comedian whose son returns to Blackpool to find the source of his father's material.
filmography.plot: A struggling comedian returns to his childhood home in Blackpool to find the perfect act and discovers dark family secrets.
